white_zinc.name: White Zinc-plated Buffer Slide
white_zinc.desc: Premium slide rail featuring high-quality zinc-plated material with superior corrosion resistance and exceptional wear resistance. Engineered for versatile applications in both residential and industrial environments.

black_rebound.name: Black Rebound Sealed Slide
black_rebound.desc: Innovative slide rail incorporating advanced rebound sealing technology, featuring a precision-finished surface that delivers outstanding wear resistance and sophisticated aesthetics.

black_silent.name: Black Silent Three-Section Slide
black_silent.desc: High-performance slide rail with optimized three-section design, delivering exceptionally smooth operation and reliable performance across various cabinet door applications.

technical.title: Technical Advantages
technical.subtitle: Precision Craftsmanship, Superior Quality
technical.description: Our stainless steel hinges incorporate advanced engineering design and precision manufacturing processes. Each component undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure product durability and operational stability.
features: High-strength stainless steel construction with superior corrosion resistance
Precision machining ensuring perfect component fit and alignment
Innovative design achieving whisper-quiet and smooth operation
Extended durability suitable for diverse environmental conditions

about.title: About Guangdong Remon Hardware Industrial Co., Ltd.
about.content1: Established in 1986, Guangdong Remon Hardware Industrial Co., Ltd. is a professional enterprise specializing in the research and development, manufacturing, and distribution of furniture hardware accessories. Since our inception, we have consistently upheld the philosophy of 'Quality First, Innovation-Driven Development,' dedicating ourselves to providing premium products and exceptional service to our valued customers.
about.content2: Our facility is equipped with state-of-the-art production equipment and staffed by a professional technical team, with product lines encompassing multiple series including slide rails and hinges. Through continuous technological innovation and process optimization, our products have earned an outstanding reputation in the market.
about.content3: The company maintains a strong focus on product quality management and has established a comprehensive quality control system. We look forward to building long-term collaborative partnerships with you, growing together, and creating the future.
